title: 【冒险地图搬运】【行尸走肉 for 1.5】【The Walking Dead】
author: 无尽七夜
txt_content:
本帖最后由 无尽七夜 于 2013-5-12 09:51 编辑

2013-5-10 20:05 上传












79f0f736afc379313c267143eac4b74543a91109.jpg (63.6 KB, 下载次数: 53)

下载附件

2013-5-10 20:05 上传









相信很多人都知道【行尸走肉】这部漫画/电视剧吧，环境设计得很不错的僵尸题材

最近由国外玩家SuperClift1在minecraft上创造了【伪】行尸走肉冒险地图


作者的话:



Do you enjoy entertainment with the highly popular and breakout hit of zombies? Recently there has been a huge influx of zombie based media, such as comics, movies and television shows, even though it was underground in the last couple of decades, zombies have really become a favorite amongst many people in the last couple of years! If you enjoy zombies you more than likely know the Walking Dead, either in television or comic form (or even both!) and you will surely get a kick out of this map, the Walking Dead map for Minecraft! This map recreates the prison from the recent season, the farm from the second season and even a couple other areas from the comics and more! There is a lot to see, a huge prison area, a wonderfully detailed farm, with windmills and everything, farm land and other nice details!  
大概意思就是【一堆废话】在minecraft里重现了电视剧第二季的农场、监狱等建筑物。剧情是作者结合漫画和电视剧的剧情创造出的【伪剧情】

此地图作者推荐使用1.5以上版本玩，原因是因为1.5的新特性，增强僵尸群攻能力，大家可以在我的直播里看到困难模式下僵尸群是多么的强悍......

注：地图使用的是冒险模式，请使用简单以上难度进行游戏


1.5版特点:
1、完美重现在监狱和农场里的僵尸 
2、新的存档点

地图导入方法：
1、下载本地图
 2、解压，把解压后文件拖进.minecraft文件夹里的saves文件夹
 3、运行游戏
 4、Have Fun！ 狂欢！

原帖地址：
www.minecraftdl.com/the-walking-dead-map/ 请务必支持原作者！
Youtube视频：http://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_embedded&v=yd_zCLmvvs0

百度网盘：
http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=413984&uk=589107677
文件显示的是1.4.7 不用在意，那是你们撸多了的幻觉 请务必使用1.5以上版本进行游戏



PS：
楼主的直播贴地址（←v←）：http://tieba.baidu.com/p/2264882766
